2.4. Module pyd1.d1exceptions¶

Created:20100111
Author:vieglais

Defines exceptions unique to PyD1.

exception pyd1.d1exceptions.D1Exception¶
Base class for exceptions raised by PyD1.
exception pyd1.d1exceptions.IntrospectionDataNotAvailableException¶
Raised when DataONE introspection information can not be retrieved either because the specified node does not provide it or a well known root node (i.e. one of the coordinating nodes) cannot be contacted.
exception pyd1.d1exceptions.TargetNotAvailableException(response, *args, **kwargs)¶

General error that is raised when accessing a URL. The message contains additional information. The response attribute of the exception contains the HTTP response.

Parameter:response – The response from the httplib2.request().
